sentences.en: Despite the crisis, the chairman's voice was urbane as usual.
sentences.cn: 尽管处于危机之中, 董事长的声音还象通常一样温文尔雅.

sentences.en: He tried hard to be urbane.
sentences.cn: 他极力作出彬彬有礼的神态.

sentences.en: He was reticent, patrician, bookish, urbane.
sentences.cn: 他沉默含蓄, 雍容华贵, 书生气十足,而又温文有礼.

sentences.en: He was urbane, courtly and honorable.
sentences.cn: 他文质彬彬 、 谦恭有礼、正直体面.

sentences.en: Homo urban us did not just live in a town: he was urbane.
sentences.cn: 可见,现代城市人不只意味着居住在城镇里,他们还有教养.

sentences.en: Homo urbanus did not just live in a town: he was urbane.
sentences.cn: 城市人属的区别不仅仅是在城镇生活,还有他更为有教养.

sentences.en: In conversation, he was suave and urbane.
KJV Salute Urbane, our helper in Christ, and Stachys my beloved.
sentences.cn: [新译]问候在基督里与我们同工的珥巴努和我亲爱的士达古.

sentences.en: Neil was urbane, witty, direct, and honest.
sentences.cn: 尼尔文雅机智，坦率诚实。

sentences.en: She describes him as urbane and charming.
She, looking like 30 years old, quite urbane, totally does not see a large force.
sentences.cn: 看她的样子30来岁, 秀秀气气的, 完全看不出来有那么大的力量.

sentences.en: Subtle lines, curving surfaces and perfectly placed details express urbane elegance.
sentences.cn: 细致的线条, 流线型的表面,以及完美安置的细节尽都显出了这款汽车的现代气息.

sentences.en: Thus a polite , urbane , witty, and intellectual art developed.
sentences.cn: 由此一种温文尔雅, 充满灵性的知识分子文学艺术发展起来.

sentences.en: Urbane, our helper in Christ, and Stachys my beloved.
sentences.cn: 9又问在基督里与我们同工的耳巴奴, 并我所亲爱的士大古安.

sentences.en: Yet , officials are increasingly pointing to their more urbane citizens as a source of concern.
sentences.cn: 官员们越来越多地提到,城镇居民正成为问题的根源.

sentences.en: You find him quite bland and urbane toward the people who would not listen to him.
sentences.cn: 他对于不听从训导的人总是和颜悦色、彬彬有礼.

words.tran_cn: 彬彬有礼的，温文尔雅的；都市化的

trans.tran_cn: 都市化的，彬彬有礼的，温文尔雅的
trans.tran_en: behaving in a relaxed and confident way in social situations
